channel.title: Roku-Developer-Sample-Feed
channel.description: Feed on video content for testing channel applications built on the Roku developer platform

item.title: Live Gaming
item.description: With the Twitch channel, you can watch the most popular broadcasts of the day, browse live broadcasts by the games you love and follow your favorite Twitch broadcasters.

media:content.media:description: With the Twitch channel, you can watch the most popular broadcasts of the day, browse live broadcasts by the games you love and follow your favorite Twitch broadcasters.
media:content.media:title: Live Gaming

item.title: Let's Get Cookin'
item.description: The Paula Deen Channel is your instant access to Paula Deen’s new and hilarious cooking and lifestyle shows. Paula and her sons, Jamie and Bobby, will cook up their delicious southern recipes and help you with hints and tips that make meal planning simple, affordable and easy.

media:content.media:description: The Paula Deen Channel is your instant access to Paula Deen’s new and hilarious cooking and lifestyle shows. Paula and her sons, Jamie and Bobby, will cook up their delicious southern recipes and help you with hints and tips that make meal planning simple, affordable and easy.
media:content.media:title: Let's Get Cookin'
